metadata.title: CVE-2024-11703 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: On Android, Firefox may have inadvertently allowed viewing saved passwordswithout the required device PIN authentication. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 133.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
